match_score.reasoning: Candidate 1 is the best match because it is an official upload from SonySoundtracksVEVO, the official channel for Sony Soundtracks. While the soundtrack metadata lists Monty Norman as the composer, David Arnold is credited for the music in this video, which is accurate as he composed the score for Casino Royale, including this specific arrangement of the theme. The authenticity and official source outweigh minor title variations or composer nuances related to the specific film's score.
